name: Drake's Return
overview: From the book "Creating Political & Military Simulation Games on Your Micro" You are the commander of a patrol of 5 ships of the line in the reign of Elizabeth I. You direct the movements of your ships to overcome a Spanish patrol. The ships fire their broadsides when in reasonable range Your ships are numbered 1-5 on the simple display, enemy ships are marked "E". Be careful not to lose your flagship, ship 1.
